message.body: I'm out at the bowling alley again. Want to meet up after?
Aww. I didn't wake till noon and just looked at my phone. Hope it was fun.
It was :-) Want to try to do something this week? I haven't seen you since last year!
Any thoughts? Any nights that are bad? I can't do Wednesday
I could do either of those right now. Any thoughts on what you want to do?
By the way I am begging for ####### invites so I can give you one. Ha ha
I keep waiting and hoping for the email.
Don't see anything fun for this week. But when looking I found that next week is restaurant week. Amy interest in that?
Sure. Pick a place, you know I like trying new restaurants!
By the way, I HAVE told you that you are not under any circumstances allowed to join the ##########, right?
I don't know how I feel about that.
The entire Philly suburbs are solid blue! We need ########### suburbs! You'll be bored to tears if you join the blue guys out there. There will be nothing for you to ######.
But if you want to hear the pitch for joining the ##########, you can talk to ###### :-P
I read a lot of dystopic fiction. It sways me to the ########## side. But you make a good argument for game play purposes. Maybe by the time I get my inv
ite the stats may be different.
It's possible. The burbs have been solid high level blue since I started playing in early December, though. But you should be able to see the current status on the map when you get your invite

For what it's worth, I took out some fields in Wallingford, upper darby and Swarthmore today. The lower level ########### players out there requested help ;-) But they'll be built back up again in days, I guarantee it.
